column5: Programme descriptionOur two-year MSc programme in Advanced Power Engineering will train you in the most up-to-date developments in power engineering technologies.You will expand your knowledge of both traditional and renewable power sources and will explore efficient and sustainable methods of power production.Through the taught courses you will acquire the advanced fundamentals, research tools and techniques of power engineering, as well as an in-depth knowledge of emerging technologies and advanced numerical methods to address some of the world's grand challenges, such as integration of wind energy, offshore renewables, energy storage and photovoltaics.
